bio:
Marjorie is a Happiness Engineer at Automattic, the parent company and maker of WordPress.com and other fine software products, including Jetpack, WooCommerce, Akismet, and more. She spends every day working with small business owners, entrepreneurs, influencers, and bloggers to help them create and manage their websites and expand their online audience. Prior to working at Automattic, she owned and managed a small digital marketing agency, focusing on small businesses and authors. 
|
shortsummary:Happiness Engineer at Automattic, the parent company and maker of WordPress.com, she is a WordPress expert with 10+ years working with business owners, influencers and bloggers to create and manage their websites and expand their online audience.
title: WordPress expert with 10+ years working with business owners, influencers and bloggers to expand their online audience.
